description: Defines the MessageStatus enum and the ChatMessage class, representing chat messages between users including serialization and copying features.

classes.name: ChatMessage
classes.description: Represents a chat message between two users with fields for ids, content, timestamp, and status, including methods for copying, converting to map, and creating from map.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of ChatMessage with an updated status if provided.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes ChatMessage to a Map<String, dynamic>.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor to create ChatMessage instance from a Map<String, dynamic>.
